blocks.name: clat
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the class of all lattices.
blocks.origin: const class clat { Lat }

blocks.name: diff.clat.s
diff.clat.c
diff.clat.w
df-lat
blocks.content: Define the class of all lattices. A lattice is a poset in which the join and meet of any two elements always exists. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.) (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: islat
blocks.content: The predicate "is a lattice." (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.) (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm islat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, clat), wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(c1), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c3), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cjn, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, clat, cpo, wa(wceq(cdm(c1), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c3), cxp(c2, c2))), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(cjn, cv(hs0))), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cmee, cv(hs0))), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cdm(cfv(cjn, cv(hs0))), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cmee, cv(hs0))), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cdm(c1), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c3), cxp(c2, c2)))
  eqeq12d(cdm(cfv(cjn, cv(hs0))), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cdm(c1), cxp(c2, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(cfv(cjn, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cjn, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cjn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cjn)
  eqeq12d(cdm(cfv(cmee, cv(hs0))), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cdm(c3), cxp(c2, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(cfv(cmee, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cmee, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cmee, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmee)
  sqxpeqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-lat(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpo)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cdm(c1), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c3), cxp(c2, c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm islat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Lat ↔(c0 ∈ Poset ∧(dom(c1)=(c2 × c2)∧ dom(c3)=(c2 × c2))))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(join ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(meet ` c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, clat, cpo, (dom(c1)=(c2 × c2)∧ dom(c3)=(c2 × c2)), (dom((join ` hs0))=((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0))∧ dom((meet ` hs0))=((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, dom((join ` hs0))=((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0)), dom((meet ` hs0))=((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0)), dom(c1)=(c2 × c2), dom(c3)=(c2 × c2))
  eqeq12d(dom((join ` hs0)), ((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0)), dom(c1), (c2 × c2), hs0 = c0)
  dmeqd((join ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((join ` hs0), c1, (join ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cjn)
  eqeq12d(dom((meet ` hs0)), ((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0)), dom(c3), (c2 × c2), hs0 = c0)
  dmeqd((meet ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((meet ` hs0), c3, (meet ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmee)
  sqxpeqd((Base ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-lat(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpo)
  diff.hs0.w((dom(c1)=(c2 × c2)∧ dom(c3)=(c2 × c2)))
}

blocks.name: latcl2
blocks.content: The join and meet of any two elements exist. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm latcl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cjn, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmee, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, clat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  jca(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c3)))
  eleqtrrd(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c2), cxp(c4, c4), w0)
  simprld(w0, wceq(cdm(c2), cxp(c4, c4)), wcel(c5, cpo), wceq(cdm(c3), cxp(c4, c4)))
  eleqtrrd(cop(c0, c1), cdm(c3), cxp(c4, c4), w0)
  opelxpd(c0, c1, c4, c4, w0)
  simprrd(w0, wceq(cdm(c3), cxp(c4, c4)), wcel(c5, cpo), wceq(cdm(c2), cxp(c4, c4)))
  sylib(w0, wa(wcel(c5, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(c2), cxp(c4, c4)), wceq(cdm(c3), cxp(c4, c4)))), wcel(c5, clat))
  islat(c5, c2, c4, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latcl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(< c0, c1 > ∈ dom(c2)∧ < c0, c1 > ∈ dom(c3)))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c2 =(join ` c5)
  ⊣ c3 =(meet ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ Lat)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
} = {
  jca(w0, < c0, c1 > ∈ dom(c2), < c0, c1 > ∈ dom(c3))
  eleqtrrd(< c0, c1 >, dom(c2), (c4 × c4), w0)
  simprld(w0, dom(c2)=(c4 × c4), c5 ∈ Poset, dom(c3)=(c4 × c4))
  eleqtrrd(< c0, c1 >, dom(c3), (c4 × c4), w0)
  opelxpd(c0, c1, c4, c4, w0)
  simprrd(w0, dom(c3)=(c4 × c4), c5 ∈ Poset, dom(c2)=(c4 × c4))
  sylib(w0, (c5 ∈ Poset ∧(dom(c2)=(c4 × c4)∧ dom(c3)=(c4 × c4))), c5 ∈ Lat)
  islat(c5, c2, c4, c3)
}

blocks.name: latlem
blocks.content: Lemma for lattice properties. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm latlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wa(wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cjn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2))
  joincl(c1, c4, c3, c2, c0, clat, w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  eleqtrrd(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, clat), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c5), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cpo), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c5), cxp(c2, c2)))
  meetcl(c1, c5, c3, c2, c0, clat, w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simp3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  eleqtrrd(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c5), cxp(c2, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cop(c1, c3), cxp(c2, c2)))
  opelxpi(c1, c2, c3, c2)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cdm(c5), cxp(c2, c2)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, clat), wceq(cdm(c5), cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c5), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  islat(c0, c4, c2, c5)
  simprr(wcel(c0, cpo), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c5), cxp(c2, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→((c1[c4]c3)∈ c2 ∧(c1[c5]c3)∈ c2))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(join ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(meet ` c0)
} = {
  jca((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c1[c4]c3)∈ c2, (c1[c5]c3)∈ c2)
  joincl(c1, c4, c3, c2, c0, clat, (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  eleqtrrd(< c1, c3 >, dom(c4), (c2 × c2), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, dom(c4)=(c2 × c2))
  sylbi(c0 ∈ Lat, dom(c4)=(c2 × c2), (c0 ∈ Poset ∧(dom(c4)=(c2 × c2)∧ dom(c5)=(c2 × c2))))
  simprl(c0 ∈ Poset, dom(c4)=(c2 × c2), dom(c5)=(c2 × c2))
  meetcl(c1, c5, c3, c2, c0, clat, (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  simp1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  simp2(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  simp3(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  eleqtrrd(< c1, c3 >, dom(c5), (c2 × c2), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, < c1, c3 > ∈(c2 × c2))
  opelxpi(c1, c2, c3, c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, dom(c5)=(c2 × c2))
  sylbi(c0 ∈ Lat, dom(c5)=(c2 × c2), (c0 ∈ Poset ∧(dom(c4)=(c2 × c2)∧ dom(c5)=(c2 × c2))))
  islat(c0, c4, c2, c5)
  simprr(c0 ∈ Poset, dom(c4)=(c2 × c2), dom(c5)=(c2 × c2))
}

blocks.name: latpos
blocks.content: A lattice is a poset. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: latjcl
blocks.content: Closure of join operation in a lattice. ( ~ chjcom analog.) (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: latmcl
blocks.content: Closure of meet operation in a lattice. ( ~ incom analog.) (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2011.)

blocks.name: latref
blocks.content: A lattice ordering is reflexive. ( ~ ssid analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: latasymb
blocks.content: A lattice ordering is asymmetric. ( ~ eqss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: latasym
blocks.content: A lattice ordering is asymmetric. ( ~ eqss analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2011.)

blocks.name: lattr
blocks.content: A lattice ordering is transitive. ( ~ sstr analog.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2011.)

blocks.name: latasymd
blocks.content: Deduce equality from lattice ordering. ( ~ eqssd analog.) (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm latasymd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c4, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, c4, c0))
} = {
  mpbi2and(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c0, c4, c1), wbr(c1, c4, c0))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wa(wbr(c0, c4, c1), wbr(c1, c4, c0)), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c3, clat), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  latasymb(c3, c0, c2, c1, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latasymd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(le ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ Lat)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[c4]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[c4]c0)
} = {
  mpbi2and(w0, c0 = c1, c0[c4]c1, c1[c4]c0)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c0[c4]c1 ∧ c1[c4]c0)↔ c0 = c1), c3 ∈ Lat, c0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  latasymb(c3, c0, c2, c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: lattrd
blocks.content: A lattice ordering is transitive. Deduction version of ~ lattr . (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm lattrd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cple, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, clat))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c5, c1, c2))
} = {
  mp2and(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c5), wbr(c5, c1, c2))
  syl13anc(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c5), wbr(c5, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(c4, clat), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c5, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  lattr(c4, c0, c3, c5, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lattrd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[c1]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(le ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Lat)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[c1]c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5[c1]c2)
} = {
  mp2and(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0[c1]c5, c5[c1]c2)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c5 ∧ c5[c1]c2)→ c0[c1]c2), c4 ∈ Lat, c0 ∈ c3, c5 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  lattr(c4, c0, c3, c5, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: latjcom
blocks.content: The join of a lattice commutes. ( ~ chjcom analog.) (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm latjcom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cjn, c0))
} = {
  mpdan(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)), wa(wcel(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c4)), wcel(cop(c3, c1), cdm(c4))))
  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c4)), wcel(cop(c3, c1), cdm(c4)))
  eleqtrrd(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cop(c1, c3), cxp(c2, c2)))
  opelxpi(c1, c2, c3, c2)
  eleqtrrd(cop(c3, c1), cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cop(c3, c1), cxp(c2, c2)))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cop(c3, c1), cxp(c2, c2)))
  opelxpi(c3, c2, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, clat), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(cfv(cmee, c0)), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  islat(c0, c4, c2, cfv(cmee, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmee, c0))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cpo), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(cfv(cmee, c0)), cxp(c2, c2)))
  syl3anl1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c4)), wcel(cop(c3, c1), cdm(c4))), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)), wcel(c0, cpo))
  latpos(c0)
  joincom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latjcom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c4]c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(join ` c0)
} = {
  mpdan((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c1[c4]c3)=(c3[c4]c1), (< c1, c3 > ∈ dom(c4)∧ < c3, c1 > ∈ dom(c4)))
  jca((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), < c1, c3 > ∈ dom(c4), < c3, c1 > ∈ dom(c4))
  eleqtrrd(< c1, c3 >, dom(c4), (c2 × c2), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, < c1, c3 > ∈(c2 × c2))
  opelxpi(c1, c2, c3, c2)
  eleqtrrd(< c3, c1 >, dom(c4), (c2 × c2), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, < c3, c1 > ∈(c2 × c2))
  ancoms(c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, < c3, c1 > ∈(c2 × c2))
  opelxpi(c3, c2, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, dom(c4)=(c2 × c2))
  sylbi(c0 ∈ Lat, dom(c4)=(c2 × c2), (c0 ∈ Poset ∧(dom(c4)=(c2 × c2)∧ dom((meet ` c0))=(c2 × c2))))

  3jca((c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c3[c6]c4)∈ c2)
  simpr1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpr3(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)

  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(c1, c3), wbr(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)), wbr(c3, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(c3, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)))

  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(c1, c4), wbr(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)), wbr(c4, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)))

thm latnlej(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

  ⊣ c5 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(join ` c0)

  3impia(c0 ∈ Lat, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), ¬ c1[c5](c3[c6]c4), (c1 ≠ c3 ∧ c1 ≠ c4))

  necon3bd(c1, c3, (c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), c1[c5](c3[c6]c4))
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), c1 = c3, c1[c5](c3[c6]c4), c3[c5](c3[c6]c4))
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, c3[c5](c3[c6]c4))
  latlej1(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  breq1(c1, c3, c5, (c3[c6]c4))
  necon3bd(c1, c4, (c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), c1[c5](c3[c6]c4))
  syl5ibrcom((c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), c1 = c4, c1[c5](c3[c6]c4), c4[c5](c3[c6]c4))
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, c4[c5](c3[c6]c4))
  latlej2(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5, c6)
  breq1(c1, c4, c5, (c3[c6]c4))
}

thm latjidm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cjn, c0))
} = {
  latasymd(co(c1, c3, c1), c1, c2, c0, cfv(cple, c0), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3anidm23(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c1, c3, c1), c2))
  latjcl(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3)
  mpbi2and(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(co(c1, c3, c1), cfv(cple, c0), c1), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1))
  latref(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cple, c0))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wa(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1)), wbr(co(c1, c3, c1), cfv(cple, c0), c1)), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2))
  latjle12(c0, c1, c2, c1, c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)
  3anidm23(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), co(c1, c3, c1)))
  latlej1(c0, c1, c2, c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c1[c3]c1)= c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(join ` c0)
} = {
  latasymd((c1[c3]c1), c1, c2, c0, (le ` c0), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2))

  latref(c0, c1, c2, (le ` c0))

  simpl(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpr(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2)
  latjle12(c0, c1, c2, c1, c1, (le ` c0), c3)
  3anidm23(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c1[(le ` c0)](c1[c3]c1))
  latlej1(c0, c1, c2, c1, (le ` c0), c3)

thm latmcom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)))

  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c4)), wcel(cop(c3, c1), cdm(c4)))
  eleqtrrd(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cop(c1, c3), cxp(c2, c2)))
  opelxpi(c1, c2, c3, c2)
  eleqtrrd(cop(c3, c1), cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cop(c3, c1), cxp(c2, c2)))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(cop(c3, c1), cxp(c2, c2)))
  opelxpi(c3, c2, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, clat), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(cjn, c0)), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)))))
  islat(c0, cfv(cjn, c0), c2, c4)
  eqid(cfv(cjn, c0))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cpo), wceq(cdm(cfv(cjn, c0)), cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c2, c2)))
  syl3anl1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wa(wcel(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c4)), wcel(cop(c3, c1), cdm(c4))), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)), wcel(c0, cpo))
  latpos(c0)
  meetcom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
}

  islat(c0, (join ` c0), c2, c4)

  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(co(c1, c6, c4), c5, c1))

  latleeqj1(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c6)
  eqcom((c3[c6]c1), c1)
  eqeq2d(c1, (c1[c6]c3), (c3[c6]c1), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  latjcom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6)
  syld3an3(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1[c5](c1[c6]c3)↔(c1[c4](c1[c6]c3)∧ c1 ≠(c1[c6]c3))), (c1[c6]c3)∈ c2)
  latjcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c6)
  pltval(c0, clat, c1, c2, (c1[c6]c3), c2, c5, c4)
}

blocks.name: latmidm
blocks.content: Lattice join is idempotent. ( ~ inidm analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm latmidm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c1), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  latasymd(co(c1, c3, c1), c1, c2, c0, cfv(cple, c0), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3anidm23(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c1, c3, c1), c2))
  latmcl(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3)
  3anidm23(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(co(c1, c3, c1), cfv(cple, c0), c1))
  latmle1(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3, cfv(cple, c0))
  mpbi2and(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), co(c1, c3, c1)), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1))
  latref(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cple, c0))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wa(wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), c1)), wbr(c1, cfv(cple, c0), co(c1, c3, c1))), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2))
  latlem12(c0, c1, c2, c1, c1, cfv(cple, c0), c3)
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latmidm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c1[c3]c1)= c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(meet ` c0)
} = {
  latasymd((c1[c3]c1), c1, c2, c0, (le ` c0), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  3anidm23(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, (c1[c3]c1)∈ c2)
  latmcl(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3)
  3anidm23(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, (c1[c3]c1)[(le ` c0)]c1)
  latmle1(c0, c1, c2, c1, c3, (le ` c0))
  mpbi2and((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c1[(le ` c0)](c1[c3]c1), c1[(le ` c0)]c1, c1[(le ` c0)]c1)
  latref(c0, c1, c2, (le ` c0))
  syl13anc((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2), ((c1[(le ` c0)]c1 ∧ c1[(le ` c0)]c1)↔ c1[(le ` c0)](c1[c3]c1)), c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpr(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2)
  latlem12(c0, c1, c2, c1, c1, (le ` c0), c3)
  eqid((le ` c0))
}

blocks.name: latabs1
blocks.content: Lattice absorption law. From definition of lattice in [Kalmbach] p. 14. ( ~ chabs1 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm latabs1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cjn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), c1), wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), cfv(cple, c0), c1))
  latmle1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, cfv(cple, c0))
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wb(wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), cfv(cple, c0), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), c1)), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2))
  latmcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  3com23(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2), wb(wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), cfv(cple, c0), c1), wceq(co(c1, c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), c1)))
  latleeqj2(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), c2, c1, cfv(cple, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cple, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latabs1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(c1[c4](c1[c5]c3))= c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(join ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(meet ` c0)
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (c1[c4](c1[c5]c3))= c1, (c1[c5]c3)[(le ` c0)]c1)
  latmle1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, (le ` c0))
  syld3an3(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, ((c1[c5]c3)[(le ` c0)]c1 ↔(c1[c4](c1[c5]c3))= c1), (c1[c5]c3)∈ c2)
  latmcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  3com23(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, (c1[c5]c3)∈ c2, ((c1[c5]c3)[(le ` c0)]c1 ↔(c1[c4](c1[c5]c3))= c1))
  latleeqj2(c0, (c1[c5]c3), c2, c1, (le ` c0), c4)
  eqid((le ` c0))
}

blocks.name: latledi
blocks.content: An ortholattice is distributive in one ordering direction. ( ~ ledi analog.) (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm latledi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cjn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  mpbi2and(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4))), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, c1), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, co(c3, c6, c4)))
  mpbi2and(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, c1), wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), c7, c1), wbr(co(c1, c5, c4), c7, c1))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), c7, c1))
  latmle1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c7)
  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(co(c1, c5, c4), c7, c1))
  latmle1(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c7)
  syldan(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wb(wa(wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), c7, c1), wbr(co(c1, c5, c4), c7, c1)), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, c1)), w3a(wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c4), c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c4), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  latjle12(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), c2, co(c1, c5, c4), c1, c7, c6)
  mp2and(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, co(c3, c6, c4)), wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), c7, c3), wbr(co(c1, c5, c4), c7, c4))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), c7, c3))
  latmle2(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c7)
  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(co(c1, c5, c4), c7, c4))
  latmle2(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c7)
  syl122anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wi(wa(wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), c7, c3), wbr(co(c1, c5, c4), c7, c4)), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, co(c3, c6, c4))), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c4), c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  latjlej12(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), c2, c3, co(c1, c5, c4), c4, c7, c6)
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wb(wa(wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, c1), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, co(c3, c6, c4))), wbr(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c7, co(c1, c5, co(c3, c6, c4)))), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c2))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c2), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c4), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2))
  latmcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c4), c2))
  latmcl(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5)
  latjcl(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), c2, co(c1, c5, c4), c6)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c3, c6, c4), c2))
  latjcl(c0, c3, c2, c4, c6)
  latlem12(c0, co(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c5, c4)), c2, c1, co(c3, c6, c4), c7, c5)
}

blocks.name: latmlej11
blocks.content: Ordering of a meet and join with a common variable. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm latmlej11(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c7, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cjn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cmee, c0))
} = {
  lattrd(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, co(c1, c7, c4), c2, c0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2))
  latmcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c7, c4), c2))
  latjcl(c0, c1, c2, c4, c7)
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(co(c1, c5, c3), c6, c1))
  latmle1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  3adant3r2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wbr(c1, c6, co(c1, c7, c4)))
  latlej1(c0, c1, c2, c4, c6, c7)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latmlej11(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→(c1[c5]c3)[c6](c1[c7]c4))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c7 =(join ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(meet ` c0)
} = {
  lattrd((c1[c5]c3), c6, (c1[c7]c4), c2, c0, c1, (c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  simpl(c0 ∈ Lat, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))
  3adant3r3(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c1[c5]c3)∈ c2)
  latmcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  simpr1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  3adant3r2(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c1[c7]c4)∈ c2)
  latjcl(c0, c1, c2, c4, c7)
  3adant3r3(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c1[c5]c3)[c6]c1)
  latmle1(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  3adant3r2(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, c1[c6](c1[c7]c4))
  latlej1(c0, c1, c2, c4, c6, c7)
}

blocks.name: lubsn
blocks.content: The least upper bound of a singleton. ( ~ chsupsn analog.) (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm lubsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(club, c0))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), c1, co(c1, cfv(cjn, c0), c1), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syl6reqr(cfv(c3, csn(c1)), co(c1, cfv(cjn, c0), c1), cfv(c3, cpr(c1, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  joinval(c1, cfv(cjn, c0), c1, c3, c0, clat, c2, c2, wa(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2))
  fveq2i(c3, csn(c1), cpr(c1, c1))
  dfsn2(c1)
  latjidm(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cjn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cjn, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lubsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` { c1 })= c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(lub ` c0)
} = {
  eqtrd((c3 ` { c1 }), c1, (c1[(join ` c0)]c1), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  syl6reqr((c3 ` { c1 }), (c1[(join ` c0)]c1), (c3 ` { c1, c1 }), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  joinval(c1, (join ` c0), c1, c3, c0, clat, c2, c2, (c0 ∈ Lat ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  simpl(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpr(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2)
  fveq2i(c3, { c1 }, { c1, c1 })
  dfsn2(c1)
  latjidm(c0, c1, c2, (join ` c0))
  eqid((join ` c0))
}

blocks.name: latjass
blocks.content: Lattice join is associative. Lemma 2.2 in [MegPav2002] p. 362. ( ~ chjass analog.) (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm latjass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cjn, c0))
} = {

blocks.name: latj12
blocks.content: Swap 1st and 2nd members of lattice join. ( ~ chj12 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm latj12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c3, c5, co(c1, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cjn, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c3, c5, co(c1, c5, c4)), co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, c4), wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  oveq1d(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4, co(c3, c5, c1), wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c1, c5, c3), co(c3, c5, c1)))
  latjcom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  latjass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, c4), co(c3, c5, co(c1, c5, c4))), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  latjass(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latj12(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→(c1[c5](c3[c5]c4))=(c3[c5](c1[c5]c4)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(join ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((c1[c5](c3[c5]c4)), (c3[c5](c1[c5]c4)), ((c1[c5]c3)[c5]c4), ((c3[c5]c1)[c5]c4), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  oveq1d((c1[c5]c3), c5, c4, (c3[c5]c1), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  3adant3r3(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c1[c5]c3)=(c3[c5]c1))
  latjcom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  latjass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syl13anc((c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), ((c3[c5]c1)[c5]c4)=(c3[c5](c1[c5]c4)), c0 ∈ Lat, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ Lat, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))
  simpr2(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpr1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpr3(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  latjass(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5)
}

blocks.name: latj32
blocks.content: Swap 2nd and 3rd members of lattice join. Lemma 2.2 in [MegPav2002] p. 362. (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm latj32(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cjn, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, c3), co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  oveq2d(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4), co(c4, c5, c3), wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  3adant3r1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(co(c3, c5, c4), co(c4, c5, c3)))
  latjcom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  latjass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syldan(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c4), c5, c3), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3))), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simpr1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  latjass(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm latj32(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2))→((c1[c5]c3)[c5]c4)=((c1[c5]c4)[c5]c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(join ` c0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(((c1[c5]c3)[c5]c4), ((c1[c5]c4)[c5]c3), (c1[c5](c3[c5]c4)), (c1[c5](c4[c5]c3)), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  oveq2d(c1, c5, (c3[c5]c4), (c4[c5]c3), (c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)))
  3adant3r1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, (c3[c5]c4)=(c4[c5]c3))
  latjcom(c0, c3, c2, c4, c5)
  latjass(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  syldan(c0 ∈ Lat, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2), ((c1[c5]c4)[c5]c3)=(c1[c5](c4[c5]c3)), (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))
  3jca((c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), c1 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)
  simpr1(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpr3(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  simpr2(c0 ∈ Lat, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c4 ∈ c2)
  latjass(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5)
}

blocks.name: latj13

blocks.origin:
thm latj13(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  3eqtr4d(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(c4, c5, co(c3, c5, c1)), co(co(c3, c5, c4), c5, c1), co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, c4), wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c3, c5, c4), c5, c1), co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, c4)), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  latj32(c0, c3, c2, c4, c1, c5)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c1, c5, co(c3, c5, c4)), co(co(c3, c5, c4), c5, c1)), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c3, c5, c4), c2))

  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c5, co(c3, c5, c1)), co(co(c3, c5, c1), c5, c4)), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c3, c5, c1), c2))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))

blocks.name: latj31
blocks.content: Swap 2nd and 3rd members of lattice join. Lemma 2.2 in [MegPav2002] p. 362. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jun-2012.)

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cjn, c0))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(co(c4, c5, c3), c5, c1), co(c4, c5, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(c4, c5, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3))), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  latj12(c0, c4, c2, c1, c3, c5)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c1, c5, c3), c5, c4), co(c4, c5, co(c1, c5, c3))), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(co(c1, c5, c3), c2))
  latjcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  latjcom(c0, co(c1, c5, c3), c2, c4, c5)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(co(co(c4, c5, c3), c5, c1), co(c1, c5, co(c4, c5, c3))), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(co(c4, c5, c3), c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(co(c4, c5, c3), c2), wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, clat), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2)))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  latjcl(c0, c4, c2, c3, c5)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, clat), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c2))
  latjcom(c0, co(c4, c5, c3), c2, c1, c5)
}

  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Lat ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c4 ∈ c2)), (c4[c5]c3)∈ c2, c0 ∈ Lat, c4 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2)

thm isclat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccla), wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(c1), cpw(c2)), wceq(cdm(c3), cpw(c2)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(club, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cglb, c0))
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccla, cpo, wa(wceq(cdm(c1), cpw(c2)), wceq(cdm(c3), cpw(c2))), wa(wceq(cdm(cfv(club, cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cdm(cfv(club, cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cdm(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cdm(c1), cpw(c2)), wceq(cdm(c3), cpw(c2)))
  eqeq12d(cdm(cfv(club, cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cdm(c1), cpw(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(club, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(club, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, club)
  eqeq12d(cdm(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), cdm(c3), cpw(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cglb, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cglb, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cglb)
  pweqd(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), c2, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cbs)
  df-clat(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpo)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cdm(c1), cpw(c2)), wceq(cdm(c3), cpw(c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isclat(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CLat ↔(c0 ∈ Poset ∧(dom(c1)= P(c2)∧ dom(c3)= P(c2))))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(lub ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(glb ` c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccla, cpo, (dom(c1)= P(c2)∧ dom(c3)= P(c2)), (dom((lub ` hs0))= P((Base ` hs0))∧ dom((glb ` hs0))= P((Base ` hs0))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, dom((lub ` hs0))= P((Base ` hs0)), dom((glb ` hs0))= P((Base ` hs0)), dom(c1)= P(c2), dom(c3)= P(c2))
  eqeq12d(dom((lub ` hs0)), P((Base ` hs0)), dom(c1), P(c2), hs0 = c0)
  dmeqd((lub ` hs0), c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((lub ` hs0), c1, (lub ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, club)
  eqeq12d(dom((glb ` hs0)), P((Base ` hs0)), dom(c3), P(c2), hs0 = c0)
  dmeqd((glb ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((glb ` hs0), c3, (glb ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cglb)
  pweqd((Base ` hs0), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs0), c2, (Base ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cbs)
  df-clat(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpo)
  diff.hs0.w((dom(c1)= P(c2)∧ dom(c3)= P(c2)))
}

blocks.name: clatlem
blocks.content: Lemma for properties of a complete lattice. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm clatlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(club, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cglb, c0))
} = {
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2))
  lubcl(c3, c1, c2, c0, ccla, wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)))
  eleqtrrd(c1, cdm(c3), cpw(c2), wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)))
  simprld(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cdm(c3), cpw(c2)), wcel(c0, cpo), wceq(cdm(c4), cpw(c2)))
  glbcl(c4, c1, c2, c0, ccla, wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2))
  eleqtrrd(c1, cdm(c4), cpw(c2), wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cpw(c2)))
  biimpri(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cpw(c2)))
  elpw2(c1, c2)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  simprrd(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(cdm(c4), cpw(c2)), wcel(c0, cpo), wceq(cdm(c3), cpw(c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(c3), cpw(c2)), wceq(cdm(c4), cpw(c2)))))
  biimpi(wcel(c0, ccla), wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wa(wceq(cdm(c3), cpw(c2)), wceq(cdm(c4), cpw(c2)))))
  isclat(c0, c3, c2, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clatlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→((c3 ` c1)∈ c2 ∧(c4 ` c1)∈ c2))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(lub ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(glb ` c0)
} = {
  jca((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), (c3 ` c1)∈ c2, (c4 ` c1)∈ c2)
  lubcl(c3, c1, c2, c0, ccla, (c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  eleqtrrd(c1, dom(c3), P(c2), (c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  simprld((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), dom(c3)= P(c2), c0 ∈ Poset, dom(c4)= P(c2))
  glbcl(c4, c1, c2, c0, ccla, (c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  simpl(c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2)
  eleqtrrd(c1, dom(c4), P(c2), (c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  adantl(c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ∈ P(c2))
  biimpri(c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ∈ P(c2))
  elpw2(c1, c2)
  fvexi(c2, cbs, c0)
  simprrd((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), dom(c4)= P(c2), c0 ∈ Poset, dom(c3)= P(c2))
  adantr(c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2, (c0 ∈ Poset ∧(dom(c3)= P(c2)∧ dom(c4)= P(c2))))
  biimpi(c0 ∈ CLat, (c0 ∈ Poset ∧(dom(c3)= P(c2)∧ dom(c4)= P(c2))))
  isclat(c0, c3, c2, c4)
}

  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)

blocks.name: lublem
blocks.content: Lemma for the least upper bound properties in a complete lattice. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm lublem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cfv(c4, c1))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c4, c1), c3, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(club, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wa(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cfv(c4, c1))), wral(s1, c2, wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(c4, c1), c3, cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  lubprop(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4, c2, c0, ccla, wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2))
  clatlubcl2(c0, c1, c2, c4)
}

  lubprop(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4, c2, c0, ccla, (c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))

blocks.content: The LUB of a complete lattice subset is an upper bound. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2011.)

thm lubub(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1)), wbr(c3, c4, cfv(c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cple, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(club, c0))
} = {
  stoic3(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1), wbr(c3, c4, cfv(c5, c1)), wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cfv(c5, c1))))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cfv(c5, c1))), wral(hs1, c2, wi(wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(c5, c1), c4, cv(hs1)))))
  lublem(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5)
  rspccva(hs0, c1, c3, wbr(cv(hs0), c4, cfv(c5, c1)), wbr(c3, c4, cfv(c5, c1)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c3, c4, cfv(c5, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c3, c4, cfv(c5, c1)))
}

blocks.origin:
thm lubl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c3)), wbr(cfv(c5, c1), c4, c3)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)

  stoic3(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c3)), wbr(cfv(c5, c1), c4, c3)), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c5, c1), c4, cv(hs0)))))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wi(wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c5, c1), c4, cv(hs0)))), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c4, cfv(c5, c1))))
  lublem(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5)

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c5, c1), c4, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, c1, wbr(cv(s0), c4, c3)), wbr(cfv(c5, c1), c4, c3))

  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c5, cfv(c4, c1)), wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))

  syl3anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wbr(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))

  simp3(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1))
  clatglble(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c4, c5)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wbr(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cfv(c4, c3)), wral(hs0, c3, wbr(cfv(c4, c1), c5, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, ccla), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2), wss(c3, c2))
  simp1(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ccla), wss(c1, c2), wss(c3, c1), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c2))

thm clatglbss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)→(c4 ` c1)[c5](c4 ` c3))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c5 =(le ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(glb ` c0)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ` c1)[c5](c4 ` c3), ∀(hs0 ∈ c3,(c4 ` c1)[c5]hs0))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c3, (c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (c4 ` c1)[c5]hs0)
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c4 ` c1)[c5]hs0, c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2, hs0 ∈ c1)
  simpl1(c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, hs0 ∈ c3)
  simpl2(c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, hs0 ∈ c3)
  sselda(hs0, c3, c1, (c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1))
  simp3(c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ⊆ c1)
  clatglble(c0, c1, c2, hs0, c4, c5)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), ((c4 ` c1)[c5](c4 ` c3)↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c3,(c4 ` c1)[c5]hs0)), c0 ∈ CLat, (c4 ` c1)∈ c2, c3 ⊆ c2)
  simp1(c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ⊆ c1)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, (c4 ` c1)∈ c2)
  clatglbcl(c0, c1, c2, c4)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ CLat, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c2)
  ancoms(c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c2)
  sstr(c3, c1, c2)
  clatleglb(hs0, c0, (c4 ` c1), c2, c3, c5, c4)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ CLat ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c4 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}
